717f7dfd-2bca-493e-b4ab-95ca50677a5e.description: Earners of the Verification Foundations badge have mastered the understanding of verification in the Digital Industry, Programmatic and different environments and channels. They now have the skills to confidently explain why there is a need for verification in the digital market place, what programmatic trading is and why it is vital to the industry, as well as understanding mobile, video, audio and OTT/CTV environments and channels.
717f7dfd-2bca-493e-b4ab-95ca50677a5e.name: Verification Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Industry Trends: The earner of this badge has learnt about the current trends, concerns and opportunities in media quality that are shaping the future of the industry. They've understood the changes around shifting industry priorities, CTV advancements, audio opportunities, mobile and social adoption and media quality concentrations especially around cookie deprecation.

Digital Media Ecosystem: The earner of this badge has understood the various companies that make up the digital ecosystem, including how they all work together to ensure a brand's message successfully reaches their consumers. The earner has also explored why media quality is so vital in today's ecosystem and how ad tech plays an important role in protecting brand's reputation and budgets.

The Programmatic Landscape: The earner of this badge has explore the programmatic landscape and has learnt what programmatic trading is, the difference between DSPs, SSPs and exchanges. They've also learnt how media is traded using these platforms and why there has been a huge shift to the way that ads are traded programmatically today. The earner has also understood the programmatic capabilities and benefits available to those utilising the IAS pre-bid segments.

Environments & Channels: The earner of this badge has dived into different environments and channels to better understand the variety available to brands when reaching consumers no matter how they are consuming media. Across mobile and CTV, the earner of this badge has understood different measurement techniques for this environment and what IAS has available today. For video and audio mediums, they have understood the background of the technology and the current measurement capabilities.

The earner of this badge has had to pass a 37 question assessment to measure their understanding of industry trends, the players involved in the digital media ecosystem, the programmatic landscape and the various channels and environments. The minimum pass mark is 75% to be awarded with this badge.

47839cdc-2612-44d2-a152-1d311b8f135f.description: Earners of the IAS Products Pro badge have grasped a strong understanding of the products available in the media quality space, including IAS' solutions and their importance for brands. They are competent in what products can support brands in their media quality efforts and add value and insight into their campaigns.
47839cdc-2612-44d2-a152-1d311b8f135f.name: IAS Products Pro

badge_template_activities.title: Brand Safety: The earner of this badge has understood the importance of brand safety for brands, when serving ads online. They have learnt the important considersations of brand safety on campaigns, including misinformation and how to implement measurement using IAS' tools.

Context Control: The earner of this badge has learnt about the importance of context and ad placement to consumers and how IAS's capabilities enable brands to avoid negative content alignment to protect brand reputation, but also how to target towards certain content context as we move to a cookie-less world.

Viewability: Earners of this badge have explored and understood what viewability is, the industry guidelines, why ads are not viewable and what core challenges look like. They've also learnt about the different considerations for viewability across different channels and environments and how to improve viewability with the use of IAS' measurement product.

Fraud: Earners of this badge have understood what is considered as ad fraud and how the industry defines ad fraud. They've also learnt how ad fraud is committed and the different types of ad fraud that occurs on campaigns. Lastly, they've learnt about the ad fraud measurement solutions that IAS has in place to protect brands' budgets.

Proprietary Platforms: The earner of this badge has learnt how brands can validate their media quality across social media environments to ensure that every impression has the opportunity to count. They've learnt how IAS' solutions help brands to ensure their campaigns are engaging real users and driving outcomes.

Earners of this badge have learnt about the media quality challenges that publishers face in the digital ad ecosystem and how IAS helps to reduce friction and increase transparency to ensure they can deliver against key metrics on campaigns.

Assessment: Earners of this badge have completed a 50-question assessment covering off everything they've learnt in the course material, including: Brand safety, brand suitability and contextual targeting, viewability, fraud, publisher solutions and proprietary platforms. They have achieved a minimum of 75% pass rate to receive this badge.

102f8cba-3a1a-47eb-8cb4-42348d1505e5.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed self paced learning in campaign set up at IAS. They are competent in setting up IAS campaigns, setting up custom lists for campaigns, and understanding the teams and structure at IAS, and whom can help with support.
102f8cba-3a1a-47eb-8cb4-42348d1505e5.name: IAS Specialist - Set Up

badge_template_activities.title: Partnership: Earners of this badge have learnt how IAS partners with clients to ensure successful media quality on their campaigns, including the teams in place to support client strategy.

Set Up & Reporting: Earners of this badge have understood how to navigate IAS Signal including how to set up campaigns and apply custom lists, how to create campaigns in the platform and how to pull reports, plus set up publisher alerts and set metric conditions.

Assessment: Earners of this badge have completed a 20-question assessment to test not only their understanding of working with IAS but the important set up and reporting steps to ensure media quality is successfully measured and addressed on campaigns. The earner of the badge passed with a minimum 75% pass mark.

9ac43260-453c-4be7-9730-bd6186f266c8.description: Earners of this badge have gained significant technical and troubleshooting knowhow of IAS set up, including creation of campaign tags ("tag wrapping") and troubleshooting discrepancies and issues with loading of creatives. They have also learnt about custom formats, what they are and how to set them up with IAS tracking.
9ac43260-453c-4be7-9730-bd6186f266c8.name: IAS Specialist - Tagging & Technical

badge_template_activities.title: Tagging: Earners of this badge have learnt IAS's tag structure and fully understand the differences between blocking and monitoring. They have also learnt about our MultiMedia tag, which allows video and audio measurement across varying environments. In addition to this they've learnt about the IAS automated tag solution to efficiently build tags via agency ad servers. They will confidently be able to build tags within the IAS platform.

Custom Formats: Earners of this badge have learnt what a custom/native format is and how they are served to the page, allowing for media quality measurement. They've understood how to apply IAS' technology for accurate measurement.
Troubleshooting: Earners of this badge have understood how to troubleshoot common scenario's that occur with 3rd-party measurement and how to rectify, and avoid, with best practices.

Assessment: Earners of this badge have taken a 30-question assessment to verify their understanding of the concepts covered in the courses. At a minimum, the earner of this badge has achieved 75% as a pass mark.

dbc78116-53b1-430e-85ac-4690c4c665fe.description: Earners of the IAS Academy Expert badge have attended a live 1.5 hour workshop to delve deep into IAS and the Media Quality space. They have learnt: the industry trends and focus areas, key verification metrics, benchmarks for quality, the IAS product suite and innovations including product development.
dbc78116-53b1-430e-85ac-4690c4c665fe.name: IAS Academy - Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Brand Safety & Suitability: Participants have understood why there is a need for Brand Safety & Suitability for advertisers and how to apply the IAS settings on both the pre and post bid environment. They have grasped the importance of custom lists and why and how Brand Suitability further protects advertisers from content misalignment

Fraud & Viewability: Participants have understood what ad fraud is, how it is defined and why it is vital for advertisers to avoid in order to protect advertising budgets. They have learnt how IAS's technology is first in class and how we mitigate ad fraud in the industry. They have also learnt about the value of measuring viewability and why Time in View and attention metrics are vital in understanding the Quality Attention on campaigns.

Contextual Targeting: Participants have understood the need for alternative targeting solutions and why AI Contextual Targeting is a strong solution to targeting consumers. They have learnt why IAS's Contextual Targeting segments are a differentiator in the market and how and where to apply them within the DSP.

Proprietary Platforms: Participants have understood the need for measuring media quality within Proprietary Platforms and how IAS is able to protect digital investments in these environments, measuring Fraud, Viewability and Brand Safety.

Environments: Participants have learned about the opportunities available in the CTV and Audio space and how IAS is addressing concerns of media quality in this ever-changing landscape. They have understood the concerns and challenges and how IAS is able to address these with our robust product suite.
Participants who have attended the Expert session have taken part in an assessment designed to test their understanding of the concepts covered in the workshop, passing a minimum 75% score.

bf983296-1808-43a5-8256-b813f6c1ad60.description: Earners of the IAS Academy Expert Plus badge have attended a live workshop to understand the finer details of working with IAS, from which products to use when, and how to launch campaigns with IAS's technology. Learners have also delved deeper into reporting options, troubleshooting and best practices to successfully launch campaigns with operational excellence.
bf983296-1808-43a5-8256-b813f6c1ad60.name: IAS Academy - Expert PLUS

badge_template_activities.title: Set Up: Earners of this badge have learnt how to set up new campaigns within IAS Signal and demo'd the platform to fully understand it's capabilities and important settings to apply. They have learnt about our custom lists, where and how to apply them as well as how to apply the Brand Safety settings to ensure media quality on campaigns. They have also witness automated processes that IAS has in place for campaign creation.

Tag Wrapping: The earner has experienced the process of applying IAS code to ad-tags for accurate measurement across multiple environments. They've seen in the platform the steps to take and learnt about the other tagging opportunities that IAS has available to improve operational efficiency. Earners have also understood the process required to measure Media Quality across Social Media environments.

Reporting: Earners of this badge have seen the reporting options available in IAS Signal from both a dashboard view and the custom report builder, including building metric conditions and filtering dashboards to focus on media quality violations. They have learnt how to read reports and understood steps to take next to improve Media Quality on their campaigns.

Troubleshooting & Best Practices: Earners of this badge have understood how best to troubleshoot common issues that are seen with launching campaigns, including tracking issues, discrepancies and low measurement for media quality. They have also understood the steps to take to resolve these issues for successful measurement. They have also delved into best practices with set up and support and engaged in a Q&A session to review and address common scenario's.

Assessment: Earners of this badge have completed an assessment based on the topics covered in the workshop, including: Campaign setup, tagging, reporting, troubleshooting, best practices and IAS Help Center. They have achieved a minimum of 75% pass mark to be awarded this certification.

30dbad8c-c0ef-4bb5-a46d-fc550009a960.description: Earners of the People Management Certificate have developed the knowledge base and skills to successfully perform all essential people management functions within Integral Ad Science. As part of the program, their knowledge now extends to the following areas: hiring and onboarding new employees, incorporating DEI considerations into deliverables, tools for maximizing team engagement and performance, formal performance management processes, and much more.
30dbad8c-c0ef-4bb5-a46d-fc550009a960.name: People Management Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the 30-segment People Manager Certification Program e-learning training path.
Participation in a series of people management retrospective sessions.

f4a8bbac-389b-426f-941d-12558ae28ac5.description: Earners of the Propel Certificate have been tapped as high-potential employees and possible future leaders at IAS. Throughout the Propel Program they have developed various leadership skills, including highly effective communication, business acumen fundamentals, emotional intelligence, how to establish a culture of accountability and inclusiveness, and much more.
f4a8bbac-389b-426f-941d-12558ae28ac5.name: Propel - Emerging Leaders Program Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in the 6-month Emerging Leaders Program live sessions.
Completed an end-of-program Capstone Project.

a4103e86-2930-42f6-a83f-0f64823374dc.description: Earners of the IAS Core Products badge have grasped a strong understanding of IAS' solutions and their importance for brands. They are competent in what products can support brands in their verification efforts and add value and insight into their campaigns.
a4103e86-2930-42f6-a83f-0f64823374dc.name: IAS Partner - Product

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have gone through key training on all of IAS products and solutions, including: Brand Safety, Brand Suitability, Viewability, Invalid Traffic (IVT) (aka Ad Fraud) and Proprietary Platforms.
Earners of this badge have successfully completed assessments for each IAS product consisting of over 20 questions. The pass mark for all assessments is 90%.

b1bc33bf-6ae1-4147-820e-62972993d973.description: Earners of the IAS Sales badge have taken their knowledge and understanding of IAS to the next level by understanding the finer details of IAS’ Proprietary Platforms, including Facebook at a deeper level and how to talk at length about IAS’s first class offering. IAS sales badge earners have demonstrated skills in presenting the IAS proposition, understanding our key value drivers, differentiators and challenges. They have also completed assessments to successfully pass this certification.
b1bc33bf-6ae1-4147-820e-62972993d973.name: IAS Partner - Sales

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have learnt about IAS’ Facebook and YouTube offerings in depth, plus have prepped for successful meetings and learnt how to confidently speak to IAS products in our pitch.
Earners of this badge have had to complete an assessment covering off Facebook and YouTube (pass mark of 90%), and complete a pitch recording of IAS.

b256eee1-db8f-4e44-b0f1-dd4f9f3bfbb7.description: Earners of the IAS Service badge have a strong understanding of how to successfully set up, adjust, tag, troubleshoot and report on a campaign within IAS’ UI: IAS Signal. IAS Service badge earners can confidently manage an IAS campaign and train clients on key parts of IAS Signal.They have had to also complete assessments to successfully pass this certification.
b256eee1-db8f-4e44-b0f1-dd4f9f3bfbb7.name: IAS Partner - Service

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of the IAS Service badge have delved deep into IAS campaign and reporting interface, learnt how to successfully tag campaigns across varying environments and how to gather meaningful insights with data and reporting. The earner will also have extensive knowledge of the IAS Help Centre to obtain support and guidance when needed.

Earners of this badge have had to complete an assessment covering off questions on our Help Center, IAS Signal, tag wrapping and troubleshooting (pass mark of 90%). They have also had to demonstrate a walk through of campaign setup, tagging and reporting for grading.

9fd73d40-1d17-41a5-9ce9-6c1f67d5498a.description: Earners of this badge have gained an in-depth knowledge of what programmatic is and how IAS solution works in this space. They have also demonstrated understanding of what contextual targeting is and why IAS’ solution is first class in the market for accuracy and scale.
9fd73d40-1d17-41a5-9ce9-6c1f67d5498a.name: IAS Partner - Programmatic & Contextual

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have furthered their knowledge and understanding of the programmatic space, and specifically, what IAS offers clients to protect their digital investments before they buy an impression. They have also learnt about IAS’ Contextual product and how it will benefit clients today and beyond, in a cookieless world.
Earners of this badge have answered questions covering both programmatic and contextual, with a minimum pass score of 90%

f0ed7345-9a56-4f59-b6c0-bb63212588f4.description: Earners of the Media Quality Foundations badge have mastered the understanding of media quality in the digital industry, the programmatic landscape and the many different environments and channels available today. They now have the skills to confidently explain why there is a need for media quality in the digital market place, what programmatic trading is and why it is vital to the industry, as well as understanding mobile, video and OTT/CTV environments and channels.
f0ed7345-9a56-4f59-b6c0-bb63212588f4.name: Traders Essentials - Media Quality Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Industry Trends: The earner of this badge has learnt about the current trends, concerns and opportunities in media quality that are shaping the future of the industry. They've understood the changes around shifting industry priorities, CTV advancements, audio opportunities, mobile and social adoption and media quality concentrations especially around cookie deprecation.

Digital Media Ecosystem: The earner of this badge has understood the various companies that make up the digital ecosystem, including how they all work together to ensure a brand's message successfully reaches their consumers. The earner has also explored why media quality is so vital in today's ecosystem and how ad tech plays an important role in protecting brand's reputation and budgets.

The Programmatic Landscape: The earner of this badge has explore the programmatic landscape and has learnt what programmatic trading is, the difference between DSPs, SSPs and exchanges. They've also learnt how media is traded using these platforms and why there has been a huge shift to the way that ads are traded programmatically today. The earner has also understood the programmatic capabilities and benefits available to those utilising the IAS pre-bid segments.

Environments & Channels: The earner of this badge has dived into different environments and channels to better understand the variety available to brands when reaching consumers no matter how they are consuming media. Across mobile and CTV, the earner of this badge has understood different measurement techniques for this environment and what IAS has available today. For video and audio mediums, they have understood the background of the technology and the current measurement capabilities.

The earner of this badge has had to pass a 37 question assessment to measure their understanding of industry trends, the players involved in the digital media ecosystem, the programmatic landscape and the various channels and environments. The minimum pass mark is 75% to be awarded with this badge.

dde4129d-c3e2-4d6e-a36a-b9a61319e72a.description: Earners of this badge have understood the impression journey from selecting IAS pre-bid segments to the point at which an ad is verified on the page for media quality. Earners have also understood the various reporting capabilities that are available within IAS Signal, including the Programmatic and CTV reporting dashboards. They have also understood pre-bid campaign setup and activation within the DSP.
dde4129d-c3e2-4d6e-a36a-b9a61319e72a.name: Traders Essentials - IAS Pre-Bid Set Up

badge_template_activities.title: Pre-bid: The earner of this badge has learnt about the value of media quality pre-bid segments within DSPs and what IAS has to offer to ensure brands only bid on Quality Impressions. They've understood which segments are available and how to apply then in DSPs.

Set Up & Reporting: Earners of this badge have understood how to navigate IAS Signal including how to set up campaigns and apply custom lists, how to create campaigns in the platform and how to pull reports, plus set up publisher alerts and set metric conditions.
Help Center: Earners of this badge have learnt about the IAS Help Center and how it can support in answering queries, plus, how to submit tickets for further support from the IAS team.

Assessment: Earners of this badge have taken a 26-question assessment to verify their understanding of the concepts covered in the courses. At a minimum, the earner of this badge has achieved 75% as a pass mark.

40cf7e8d-9268-4c79-9951-e08c1af88aa0.description: Earners of this badge have gone through extensive training on all of IAS products and solutions, including: Context Control, Brand Safety, Brand Suitability, Viewability, Invalid Traffic (IVT) (aka Ad Fraud) and IAS Programmatic solutions.
40cf7e8d-9268-4c79-9951-e08c1af88aa0.name: Traders Essentials - IAS Products for Traders

badge_template_activities.title: Brand Safety: The earner of this badge has understood the importance of brand safety for brands, when serving ads online. They have learnt the important considerations of brand safety on campaigns, including misinformation and how to implement measurement using IAS' tools.

Context Control: The earner of this badge has learnt about the importance of context and ad placement to consumers and how IAS's capabilites enable brands to avoid negative content alignment to protect brand reputation, but also how to target towards certain content context as we move to a cookie-less world.

Viewability: Earners of this badge have explored and understood what viewability is, the industry guidelines, why ads are not viewable and what core challenges look like. They've also learnt about the different considerations for viewability across different channels and environments and how to improve viewability with the use of IAS' measurement product.

Fraud: Earners of this badge have understood what is considered as ad fraud and how the industry defines ad fraud. They've also learnt how ad fraud is committed and the different types of ad fraud that occurs on campaigns. Lastly, they've learnt about the ad fraud measurement solutions that IAS has in place to protect brands' budgets.

Earners of this badge have completed a 37-question assessment covering everything they've learnt in the course material, including: Brand safety, brand suitability and contextual targeting, viewability and fraud. They have achieved a minimum of 75% pass rate to receive this badge.

4554a7d2-f62a-40c9-8e0e-e1602f5b3f9b.description: Earners of this badge have learnt how to set up media quality measurement on campaigns that are running in the pre-bid environment and how to successfully apply pre-bid segments to ensure media quality. The badge earner has learnt about common troubleshooting scenario's when applying media quality segments and how to rectify them. They have also successfully passed an assessment to demonstrate their understanding.
4554a7d2-f62a-40c9-8e0e-e1602f5b3f9b.name: Traders Essentials - Pre-bid Technical

badge_template_activities.title: Tagging: Earners of this badge have learnt IAS's tag structure and fully understand the differences between blocking and monitoring. They have also learnt about our MultiMedia tag, which allows video and audio measurement across varying environments. In addition to this they've learnt about the DSP integrations we have at IAS. Following the course, the badge earner will confidently be able to build tags within the IAS platform.

Troubleshooting: Earners of this badge have understood how to troubleshoot common scenario's that occur with 3rd-party measurement and how to rectify, and avoid, with best practices. This course focuses specifically on the scenario's faced by traders using IAS segments within DSPs.

Assessment: Earners of this badge have taken a 30-question assessment to verify their understanding of the concepts covered in the courses. At a minimum, the earner of this badge has achieved 75% as a pass mark.
